put the card on the center of the ledge above

face the book shelf directly above the desk

Take a small step to your right.
Put the credit card on the shelf by your head.

Put the red credit card on the middle of the shelf above the wooden desk.

Pick up the credit card on the desk.
Look up.
Place the credit card on the shelf in front of the books.

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the desk.

turn to the left, face the desk
take the red bank card from the desk
put the bank card on the desk shelf

Turn around and walk to the lamp on the desk.

turn the lamp on

pick up the bottom most CD from the desk
turn around 180 degrees, then turn right and stop at the next desk

Back away from the desk to face the desk drawers.
Place this pen inside the top desk drawer.

Find the drawer where you place the other pen in the desk.
